content: Hello! This is XYZ Home Services. I see you need plumbing assistance. May I have your name to get started with scheduling your appointment?
I’m sorry, but I don’t feel comfortable giving my name right now.
I understand your concern. Unfortunately, to schedule an appointment, we do need to have a contact name for our records. Is there any way you could share your first name or initials?
No, I’ll have to pass then, thanks.
reason: Customer refused to provide name necessary for booking.
